name: Speculo
description: Speculo is a hand drawn point and click horror game. It will feature a spooky storyline where your choices matter and two anxiety inducing minigames. This submission includes the introduction, the first minigame, and the first major decision in the game. For our final submission we plan to have a second mini game, more rooms to explore, more collectibles and objects to obtain along with a lot more to the story. Warning - turn your sound down.
